hhsMinimumBatteryLevelRequiredToRelease.title: Minimum Battery Level to Release HHS
hhsMinimumBatteryLevelRequiredToRelease.description: The minimum battery level required to release a handheld scanner.

hhsInactiveDaysBeforeRemoval.title: Inactive Days Before HHS Removal
hhsInactiveDaysBeforeRemoval.description: Number of days after which an inactive handheld scanner is removed. The default is set to 90 days.

enableConcurrentHhsLimitPerShopper.title: Enable Concurrent HHS Limit Per Shopper
enableConcurrentHhsLimitPerShopper.description: When set to true, it limits the number of active handheld scanners a shopper can have at the same time.

maximumConcurrentHhsAllowedPerShopper.title: Maximum Concurrent HHS Devices Per Shopper
maximumConcurrentHhsAllowedPerShopper.description: Number of active handheld scanners a shopper can have at the same time.

concurrentHhsCountExpiry.title: Concurrent HHS Count Expiry Time
concurrentHhsCountExpiry.description: Time to live (in minutes) for shopper active handheld scanners count. This is the duration after which the count of active handheld scanners for a shopper is reset. The default is set to 1440 minutes (24 hours).

euStatusThresholds.title: EU Status Thresholds
euStatusThresholds.description: Percentage thresholds for Entrance Unit (EU) status calculation. Format: {Empty},{Low},{Normal},{High},{Full}. Empty must always be 0 and Full must always be 100.
